name: selectize-enter-key-submit
description: This is a little [Selectize](https://github.com/brianreavis/selectize.js) plugin that will allow you to submit the form when a user hits the enter key. The plugin triggers a `submit` event which you can listen to and handle how you will. The event will only be triggered if the input is empty.
author: Wayne Ashley Berry <wayneashleyberry@gmail.com>
